entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY, COOLER WITH HIGHS AROUND 60
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING NORTHEAST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 60
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
LOWS AROUND 40

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
